intro: Angylocalyx pynaertii, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its rosette-shaped foliage and showy, tubular flowers. Angylocalyx pynaertii is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
